 "mE WANTS SMASH DECEPTICONS!!!!" Shuoted impatient Sludge while he moved his massive tail
  robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote: Grimlock took a few seconds to push himself up. Then clenched his fists,
and snorted. "Why we not kill them. We could be two Decepticons less by
now?" Grimlock demanded. His visor flared.

Hoist pulled himself out from underneath the main computer, and opened
up a large circuit board. He then began to fuse it with his laser
wielder, as he kept holding it up, the whole time humming to himself.
Then after a bit his wielder died. "There, i'll see if that works." He
leaned over, and spoke into a microphone. "Commander, can you hear me,
if you can that means we can now communicate over long distances again."
he said hopefully. Now was the moment of truth.

Cliffjumper was taking a step to stop grimlock, when he heards a fizzle
of electricity, and a scream over to his right. "Strafe." he yelled
worriedly, as the Technobot began to short circuit. He took a few short
strides, then began to sprint towards the technobot, until a blue fizzle
of the same electricity engulfed him, and his legs stopped moving in
full motion, as his momentum took him forwards, first onto his stomach,
then bouncing roughly onto his back, as he twitched from the heavy
overload. He then opened his mouth, and let out a pained scream.
))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))


"Cliffjumper" Firedrill yelled, he knew that scream. He quickly reved
his engine, and zoomed towards the noise, forgetting everything around
him.
